title: Not sure if I should have posted this in clubs but IDK
body:
Not sure if I should have posted this in player creations or clubs forums so I posted it here I just thought it would be a fun idea if having enough club members in a club turned it into a Guild. 

But in saying this I might as well just make a ranked team I suppose.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6zTAW6uY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-30T02:23:26.173+0000)
>
> What would the difference be ?

I suppose it'd be to recognise larger clubs :P
